entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near midnight then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 4:33 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:33 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
